## Tree.verifyProof() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Verifies that a proof is valid.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
verifyProof(proof: Proof, key: Buffer, value: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  proof | [Proof](./iavl.proof.md) | The proof that should be verified. |
|  key | Buffer | The key that the proof is for. |
|  value | any | The key's value that should be verified. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
